hero.label: About Future/Sync
hero.title: Decoding the Future,
hero.subtitle: One Post at a Time.
hero.description: We explore the intersection of technology, design, and culture. We aren't just reporting on the future; we're trying to understand it alongside you.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Simplifying Complexity
mission.description: The world of technology moves fast. Too fast. Our goal is to slow it down, deconstruct the high-level concepts, and make them accessible without losing the nuance that makes them important. We write for the curious mind.

origin.title: The Origin Story
origin.p1: It started with a simple notebook and a curiosity about how things work. Back in 2018, I felt overwhelmed by the sheer volume of tech news. It felt like noise. I wanted signal.
origin.p2: What began as a personal newsletter to 50 friends quickly spiraled. People were hungry for analysis, not just headlines. They wanted to know why things mattered.
origin.p3: Today, Future/Sync is more than just me. It's a collective of writers, designers, and thinkers who believe that the future is worth understanding properly. We aren't optimists or pessimists; we are realists who love cool tech.

2018.title: Blog Founded
2018.desc: Started as a weekend project in a small apartment.

2019.title: First 10,000 Readers
2019.desc: Hit our first major milestone purely through organic growth.

2021.desc: Expanded into audio formats to reach commuters.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.text: Welcome to TechBlog Future. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you as to how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

collect.title: 2. The Data We Collect
collect.text: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together follows:
collect.identityDesc: includes first name, last name, username or similar identifier.
collect.contactDesc: includes email address and telephone number.
collect.technicalDesc: includes internet protocol (IP) address, browser type and version, time zone setting and location.
collect.usageDesc: includes information about how you use our website, products and services.

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
use.text: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data in the following circumstances:
use.list1: Where we need to perform the contract we are about to enter into or have entered into with you.
use.list2: Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.
use.list3: Where we need to comply with a legal or regulatory obligation.

contact.title: 4. Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing and using TechBlog Future, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. In addition, when using these particular services, you shall be subject to any posted guidelines or rules applicable to such services.

ip.title: 2. Intellectual Property
ip.text: The Site and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of TechBlog Future and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the United States and foreign countries.

contributions.title: 3. User Contributions
contributions.text: Users may post comments and other content as long as the content is not illegal, obscene, threatening, defamatory, invasive of privacy, infringing of intellectual property rights, or otherwise injurious to third parties or objectionable.

termination.title: 4. Termination
termination.text: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

law.title: 5. Governing Law
law.text: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
